A singular version of its parent technique, [[Lee]] instead starts spinning by himself creating strong winds around him, and dives down on the opponent rather than with them.

== Trivia ==
* In the ''[[Rock Lee's Springtime of Youth Full Power Ninja Chronicles]]'', when introducing the first part of an episode, Lee preforms a manoeuvre similar to this technique.
